title: BRIEF-Aboitiz Equity Ventures Confirms Unit Submitted Proposal To Operate And Maintain Bicol Intl Airport
text:
BRIEF-Aboitiz Equity Ventures Confirms Unit Submitted Proposal To Operate And Maintain Bicol Intl Airport

Stock Markets 28 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 17:10)

BRIEF-Aboitiz Equity Ventures Confirms Unit Submitted Proposal To Operate And Maintain Bicol Intl Airport Oct 7 (Reuters) - Aboitiz Equity Ventures Inc :

* CONFIRMS UNIT SUBMITTED TO DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION AN

UNSOLICITED PROPOSAL TO OPERATE AND MAINTAIN BICOL INTL AIRPORT



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX1bwgP1

Further company coverage: AEV.PS





BRIEF-Aboitiz Equity Ventures Confirms Unit Submitted Proposal To Operate And Maintain Bicol Intl Airport
